book.real_peaceful_mode.start: Welcome to the magical and realistic world. You may have to hide to avoid attacking by monsters, kill or get killed, but do you know why they keep attacking you? Go and find it out!
book.real_peaceful_mode.start.zombie_for: The Zombie Fort is located in plains, sunflower plains, meadows, or forest biomes. The monarch of zombies stays in the fort, ruling the zombie race - he seems to be so prestigious that all zombies support him.
book.real_peaceful_mode.start.skeleton_p: The Skeleton Palace is located in savanna, windswept savanna, or savanna plateau biomes, and the king of the skeleton lives in the palace. However, it seems to be no news about him in recent years for no reason.
book.real_peaceful_mode.start.creeper_to: The Creeper Town is located in the flower forests, birch forests, or old growth birch forests. Creepers live happily in this town.
book.real_peaceful_mode.start.pharaoh_al: The Pharaoh Altar is located in the desert. It is said that a pharaoh lives in the altar, but nobody has really seen him - but only his statues.
structure.real_peaceful_mode.all_structu: You can talk with monsters here, and receive missions given by them.
death.attack.pike_hidden: %s is piked to death by a hidden weapon
Zombies are friendly to you now.
message.real_peaceful_mode.skeletons_wis: Skeletons are friendly to you now.
message.real_peaceful_mode.creepers_wish: Creepers are friendly to you now.
message.real_peaceful_mode.husks_wish.su: Husks are friendly to you now.
message.real_peaceful_mode.reward_monste: Congratulations to %s for completing the wishes of %s. They will never regard you as enemies from now on.
mission.real_peaceful_mode.zombie1.name: Zombie's Fort
mission.real_peaceful_mode.zombie1.descr: Run away and find someone to help you from zombie guards.
mission.real_peaceful_mode.zombie1.after: Stroll around outside the fort and find someone to talk to.
mission.real_peaceful_mode.zombie2.name: Senior Zombie and Villager
mission.real_peaceful_mode.zombie2.descr: Find the key to save the zombies. You may need to find a senior villager first.
mission.real_peaceful_mode.zombie3.name: Fight for Zombies
mission.real_peaceful_mode.zombie3.descr: Defeat the tyrant of zombies, and bring peace back to zombie's kingdom!
mission.real_peaceful_mode.zombie3.after: Congratulations! You have already completed the missions given by the zombies.
mission.real_peaceful_mode.events/zombie: Make a helmet and give it to the little zombie.
Nice helmet! He feels thankful to you.
Beat the evil knights down and take the wallet back to the zombie.
Nothing's missing! He feels thankful to you.
mission.real_peaceful_mode.skeleton1.des: There must be a special enchantment for bows to destroy fragile blocks.
mission.real_peaceful_mode.skeleton1.aft: Go inside the palace and talk to the king.
mission.real_peaceful_mode.skeleton2.des: Find the crystal skull. You may need to find a senior villager first.
mission.real_peaceful_mode.skeleton2.aft: Take the skull back and give it to the king.
mission.real_peaceful_mode.skeleton3.des: Find 64 of the dirt-like blocks for the king, which is able to turn cooled lava into basalt.
mission.real_peaceful_mode.skeleton3.aft: Congratulations! You have already completed the missions given by the skeletons.
mission.real_peaceful_mode.events/skelet: Help skeleton find his missing arm.
Hope the arm still fits the poor guy's body.
mission.real_peaceful_mode.creeper1.name: Why Explode?
mission.real_peaceful_mode.creeper1.desc: Make an experimental flower with culture table. You may need to find a botanist villager first.
mission.real_peaceful_mode.creeper1.afte: You've got an experimental flower. How to make the explosion blocker?
mission.real_peaceful_mode.creeper2.name: A Pink Friend
mission.real_peaceful_mode.creeper2.desc: Take the pink creeper back to creeper's town. You are allowed to keep her in your place for a while until you find the way to the destination.
mission.real_peaceful_mode.creeper2.afte: You've got a creeper's bead. Make the explosion blocker and send it to your friend.
mission.real_peaceful_mode.creeper3.name: A Difficult Challenge
mission.real_peaceful_mode.creeper3.desc: Wait for the pink creepers at creeper's town. You'd better let her go alone.
mission.real_peaceful_mode.creeper3.afte: Congratulations! You have already completed the missions given by the creepers.
mission.real_peaceful_mode.husk1.name: Pharaoh's Altar
mission.real_peaceful_mode.husk1.descrip: Try your best to defeat the husk pharaoh.
mission.real_peaceful_mode.husk1.after: What a hard struggle! But where can you find water source?
mission.real_peaceful_mode.husk2.name: Flocculant
mission.real_peaceful_mode.husk2.descrip: Obtain something able to purify the water and give it to the husk workman. You may need to find a plumber villager first.
mission.real_peaceful_mode.husk2.after: Wax the pharaoh's stone statues, and defeat him!
mission.real_peaceful_mode.husk3.name: Last Fight on the Altar
mission.real_peaceful_mode.husk3.after: Congratulations! You have already completed the missions given by the husks.
advancements.real_peaceful_mode.root.des: This world is full of cruelty. We are blessed and cursed.
advancements.real_peaceful_mode.finish_a: Who Can Stop Me Finishing Missions?
advancements.real_peaceful_mode.achieve_: Achieve all monsters' dreams. Thanks for playing real peaceful mode mod. The mod is still under construction. More monsters' wishes are coming soon for you to achieve!
book.real_peaceful_mode.zombie.title: Mind of zombies
book.real_peaceful_mode.zombie.content1: Hundreds years ago, zombies and human beings are two different races but get along well with each other. However, everything changed when the tyrant took the crown. Zombies lose their mind, killing human and even other mobs, and spread zombie virus to infect others.
book.real_peaceful_mode.zombie.content2: It do makes zombies stronger and makes kingdom richer, but that's meaningless for those don't have mind. Luckily, some pioneers of us find golden apples are good medicine against the virus, but we must solve the problem from the root. They built magic pools in swamps -
book.real_peaceful_mode.zombie.content3: once you throw a dark zombie's head and a piece of rotten flesh into a magic pool, the magic matrix will be activated, and zombies will soon get their minds back. If you want to fight for zombies against the tyrant, I believe everyone will help you eventually.
book.real_peaceful_mode.skeleton.title: Crystal Skull
book.real_peaceful_mode.skeleton.content: Crystal Skull is an epic treasure in the Aether, maybe I have to call it, the End now. Yes, the Aether Dragon was died thousand years ago, and the curse was left to the monsters in the overworld. The Aether became more scattered and was under the domination by the

Ender Dragon. So young people likes to call it the End. If you want to find the crystal skull, you'd better defeat the Ender Dragon first, and travel to the outer islands, searching for a weird floating island with soul torch. Then walk down the stairs towards the
chest. Remember to take care when exploring, I'm not sure what will happen when you break into the cave.
book.real_peaceful_mode.creeper.title: An Exploding Plant?
book.real_peaceful_mode.creeper.content1: It's not a long history since we first discover creepers, first known as a moving and exploding plant. But only a few years later, the population of creepers has already become so large that we can commonly see them all around the overworld. However, this creature
book.real_peaceful_mode.creeper.content2: seems not to evolve complete consciousness yet - they just keep moving and explode when some environment changes happen. Recently, I met a pink creeper in a cherry grove. Some genetic defect happens to this poor creeper so it cannot explode by itself. I think if some
book.real_peaceful_mode.creeper.content3: one could use the culture table to #produce a transgenic flower# that may be made from tulips, torchflowers, alliums or blue orchids, and #find the pink creeper# again, the explosion blocker, which will prevent creepers from exploding, will be easily made.
book.real_peaceful_mode.slime.title: The Sticky Vegetal Monster
book.real_peaceful_mode.slime.content1: Slime does not have a long history of evolution. It was originally a plant that secreted mucus, which their seeds were wrapped in. When animals were stained with the mucus, after it goes dry, and the seeds were fallen off and take root in suitable places. However, about
book.real_peaceful_mode.slime.content2: a thousand years ago, this plant mutated rapidly and began to have a weak awareness. They grew in the dark and moist underground and swamps, devouring passing small creatures to provide them with nutrients. Although they are no longer completely plants, they still spread
book.real_peaceful_mode.slime.content3: and reproduce by covering their seeds with mucus. After the death of the mother, the offspring will quickly regenerate. Their soft shells and structures exposing their vitals indicated that there's no overlapping between slimes and humans.
book.real_peaceful_mode.husk.title: How to Purify Water
book.real_peaceful_mode.husk.content1: The water in the desert is often too silty to drink, so we need to purify it. Some pioneers invented water purifier to filtrate the water source, which we can use at home. But this method is not suitable for purifying water outside, or making the water clean in a well.
book.real_peaceful_mode.husk.content2: Then we discovered that PAC, a kind of flocculant, can make sediment in the water subside. PAC is also easy to make - collect the alunite from alunite ore shallowly underground, make a alunite block, then smelt it in a blast furnace. The high degree of safety and low
book.real_peaceful_mode.husk.content3: dosage of PAC make it the best choice for outdoor water purification.
book.real_peaceful_mode.drowned.title: The Sea-God's Long-Cherished Wish
book.real_peaceful_mode.drowned.content1: The sea-god, the dragon king of the ocean, was the most beloved and eldest son of the Aether Dragon. However, he disappeared mysteriously just a few years before the Aether Dragon passed away, which caused earth-shaking changes in the oceans of the Minecraft world.
book.real_peaceful_mode.drowned.content2: The aborigines of the ocean kingdom gradually disappeared, while drowned and guardians appeared; many merchant ships sank in mysterious circumstances, and it was really dangerous to travel on the sea at night. But I firmly believe that the sea-god is still alive, maybe
book.real_peaceful_mode.drowned.content3: using his way to protect the stability of the sea somewhere in the vast ocean. In short, if the sea-god can be found in the deep oceans, everything will be fine. The dragon scales are scattered throughout the oceans, which I think may help you on your journey.
rpm.mission.real_peaceful_mode.zombie1.m: What a magnificent fort! But there's an awful smell exuded from the deep of it. What could it be?
Who the freak is bothering me when I'm sleeping?
What? A player? What are you here for?
Nothing, sir. I come for peace.
There's no peace between zombies and human beings. Where's my guards? TAKE THE PLAYER OUT!
Stop please! I think I have to run away from here.
Dang, there's so many of them. I have to run away.
Is it the king of zombie? Why we're always chased by zombies? Maybe someone can explain everything to me no far away from the fort.
rpm.mission.real_peaceful_mode.zombie2.m: No no, chill. I'm the forgotten.
The forgotten? But you look like a grandpa. I'm sorry. Could you please tell me what happened in that fort?
Nevermind, you've already seen the tyrant of us?
Tyrant? You mean the zombie looks like a king with a lot of guards?
Yes, he took our hearts, and our mind. I'm supposed to be the only survivor in that disaster.
I've been escaping for hundreds of years. Oh my Aether Dragon God, hope they can't find and recognize me now.
Long time ago, zombies can get along well with human beings. I was also one of them living a happy life.
But after the tyrant's accession, that water we drink was injected into cursed. Everyone lose their mind and became aggressive.
Zombie virus spread among the world, which seems to provide huge power to the tyrant.
Then he trained a military called the dark zombie knights, keeping political stability of the kingdom, and killing anyone who opposes him.
That's horrible. I want to do something for you. But can I believe you?
Get their mind back please. That will make you stronger to fight against the tyrant. I promise you that zombies will help you defeat the tyrant.
Take this please, go to the villages and find a senior, then you may get the answer. I'm hiding. I believe you can save us, young guy.
What's this, a spirit bead? Oh, okay, that's weird. Maybe I could find it out in a village.
That's inconceivable. So from now on the zombies are going to stand by my side?
I think it's time for me to fight back towards the fort.
rpm.mission.real_peaceful_mode.zombie3.m: So here I am, going to defeat the tyrant's kingdom and rescue the zombies. Am I crazy for doing this?
But I feel confident about this fight. I believe zombies will stand by my side.
Everything's proving you are wrong, Mr. King of zombie!
No... I... I'm the only one who... who is right...
Why you still dig your heels in it? You make wars between zombies and other innocent creatures. Why?
Wars... makes us stronger... peace is for losers...
No, peace is for winners. I defeat you, and I'll bring peace to zombies.
It makes... no sense... I'll... be back soon...
If so, I'll beat you another time!
rpm.mission.real_peaceful_mode.event.zom: Sorry to bother you, but please help me! I'm gonna, just, it's time to... no much time left...
Don't be hurry, my boy. What's happening? You want my help?
Yes. My leather cap is running out of its durability. If it breaks, I'm gonna burn! But I can't craft a helmet by myself...
Sure, I'll make a helmet for you. Please wait for me.
Hey my boy. Take the helmet with you.
Thank you, my hero! Here's my payback. I hope you would like it.
Please! Help me! I was just robbed by a dark knight. That's all my money and I can't live without it.
Alright, I see him. I'll beat him down and take your wallet back!
Here you are. Watch out for the evil knights.
Thank you very much! Please take my payback. I have to go. Thanks a lot again.
rpm.mission.real_peaceful_mode.skeleton1: My bow's broken now. And I still can't crack the crystal. What could it be inside the rock?
Player? P... please... don't hurt me...
No no, I swear I won't hurt you if you don't hurt me. This building is awesome. Is it your house?
Obviously no, I'm just an archer protecting my king.
Well, yea, an archer without a bow.
Stop laughing at me! I was just trying to crack the crystal but broke my bow by accident. What are you here for? I'll call the security.
Chill out, archer. Listen, I come for peace. Why you want to break the glowing rock?
Have you heard about the legend about crystal skull? It is said that this rock was brought from a crystal cave in the aether.
But Aether Dragon died thousand years ago. We are not sure what the crystal cave turned into, neither do we know where the crystal skull is.
So another question, why you hold on to the crystal skull? And actually I don't know the legend.
Crystal skull is the symbol of power and glory. If you can crack the crystal and present it to the king, he must bestow supreme honor on you.
Fine. I'll take a try. But the crystal is infected, so I'm not sure the crystal skull lies inside it.
And do not play tricks, foreigner. You are inside the skeleton palace. I'm watching you.
What? There's nothing inside the crystal. I'm going to tell the king about it.
rpm.mission.real_peaceful_mode.skeleton2: Sorry for entering the palace without permission, sire. But I'm supposed to tell you there's nothing inside the glowing crystal.
I heard about you, but you just cracked it already? Amazing! None of my archers made it out.
But we really need the crystal skull. Our skeleton family's prosperity is on the decline. So we need it to put us on the path to the recovery.
I don't quite understand, and I afraid that the crystal skull is still in the dimension called the aether.
Well... you know why skeletons are always attacking the players for no reasons?
Skeletons are cursed, powerful but weak. They have to protect themselves this way unconsciously.
But if I obtain the crystal skull, everything will change. I can charge my scepter with it, and save my people of my kingdom. That's my duty.
What a nice king... I mean, yes, I'll try to help you.
Thanks. Take this with you. You might need this bead in some cases.
This island must be the crystal skull island.
Endermites? This place seems to be deeply erosion by some mysterious power. And the skull must lies in the cave. I'll take it back to the king.
rpm.mission.real_peaceful_mode.skeleton3: I found the crystal cave in the End, sire. And this must be the crystal skull you need.
You made it! I'm going to grant you "the Cavalier of Skeleton" title.
What happens? Did I make any mistakes?
No, you did a good job. But the crystal skull has little energy left, neither does my scepter. "Noise of the nether" is needed to charge them.
I don't know what it is, but I can tell you the key characteristic of it. It's as soft as dirt, and can be commonly found in the nether.
When the wind blows over, it reflects noise that sounds like ghosts' yell. Most importantly, it has the ability to turn cooled lava into basalt.
Turning cooled lava into basalt? I think I know what it is.
I've got 64 soul soil blocks. Is it what you need?
Yes, nice job! That's right what I need! I'll try it.
It works! Take my scepter, my cavalier.
What? So you are giving the scepter to me?
You deserve it. You put our skeleton family on the way to the recovery, and also I don't need this anymore.
You must walk on a more harder path to your journey in this world. All monsters changes a lot after the Aether Dragon's death.
I wish the scepter will bless you when you meet troubles, and give you power to fight back. Go and save them, my cavalier.
Thank you for your encouragement, sire. And I'm ready to help other creatures.
rpm.mission.real_peaceful_mode.event.ske: Hello, skeleton. What happens to your right arm?
I don't know. I was just sleeping nearby. As I woke up, I found my arm's missing.
Please help me find my arm. I can't hold anything or protect myself without it.
Sure, maybe it's lying some place not far away from where you was sleeping. I'm going to search for it.
I found your right arm in a fox's mouth. Here you are.
Yes! Here's some award for you. I'm really thankful to you, my hero!
A dilapidated town? Everything seems to lose its vitality here.
What? A creeper? I'm gonna run.
I... I cannot explode... I'm trying...
You scared me. I come for peace, and I swear I won't hurt you. I mean, why you creepers are always trying to explode?
It's the only way... for us... to reproduce...
Again? Nah, your explosion's puzzling everyone, you know? Please stop doing this.
But I can't control myself... All emotional changes make us unstable - fear, worry, joy and shyness.
And explosions spread our spores out to farther places, which may produce more creepers.
I see, so you keep doing self-killing jobs to spread your spores out? What can I do to prevent you from exploding?
We do not have any cognition about living or killing. I'm sorry for not knowing what can I do for you. Please ask anyone else.
Maybe I should go to the villages and ask somebody who masters botany.
Finally, I successfully made this transgenic plant. It cost me a lot of flowers and gunpowder.
But I'm still not quite sure how to make a explosion blocker from this. Maybe I need, a sample of spores from a stable creeper?
What's this? A pink creeper? It's just too similar with the environment color for me to realize.
I'm sorry... I'm a freak... Nobody likes me...
Sorry, I don't mean that. What are you here for?
My friends laughed at me because of my skin color... And I cannot explode... So I feel self-abased and want to run away from everything...
I'm sorry to hear that. Look, I won't laugh at you, and I think it's not a bad thing for you that you can't make explosions.
Really? But... It's still embarrassing for me.
No, let's make friends with each other.
Re... really? I'm... really glad to hear that.
Yes, let me send you back to your home.
Why you look so sad? Anything happened to your home?
I lived in a town with many other creepers... And they have already exploded... When you see the broken walls, you may feel depressed...
Besides, I have already forgotten the way back.
It doesn't matters. Follow me and I'll help you find your place.
Thank you, I'm... so delighted... that I'll explode...
What? Oh, that sounds horrible. But I remember that you said you are not able to explode.
Yes... So don't worry about me. I'm following you.
Thank you for sending me back to the town. By the way, I think I should tell you something about myself.
Nevermind, I'm glad to listen to you.
I met a scholar-like person before, and he said I have a genetic defect, which is also the reason why I cannot explode.
Defect? I'm sorry to hear that, but that's a merit in my opinion.
But... how can I reproduce myself without explosion?
Sorry, I don't mean to disappoint you. I want to find a way to make creepers reproduce without exploding.
If I succeed, creepers will no longer destroy anything, stop self-killing, and become peaceful to us.
In that case, you may need this.
A bead? Thanks. See you next time when I finish it!
I'll strolling around here. You can come to see me at any time.
Hi, my friend! You know what, I finally successfully made this!
You did? How does it work?
That's a transgenic medicine. After drinking this, creepers will be able to spread their spores by breathing.
And its another function is to smoothen the mood changes of creepers to avoid explosions.
Great! Let me help you send it to other towns!
OK, please lead the way.
But... isn't it dangerous for you to meet other creepers?
Yes, but...
You are my first best friend... I don't want you get hurt... so let me do something for you please!
OK, take this. Take care of yourself!
I'm fine. Wait for me here please.
But... should I just let her go like this? She was regarded as a freak by other creepers. I'm worried but I believe her.
I'll wait here till she's back.
Glad to see you back here. Are you OK?
Yes, but...
What's wrong? The drug doesn't work?
It works OK, and creepers won't explode anymore.
So... you are picked on by them?
(Sob)
I'm sorry, I should have gone with you.
It was a hard time, but I persuaded them. I didn't disappoint you.
Because... we are best friends!
Yes, we are best friends for ever! Thanks a lot for your help. I really appreciate that.
Will you come to see me when you're free? I know you are busy in saving other monsters under curses...
How can I forget my best friend! I will, of course.
Thank you. I'm staying here and waiting for you.
rpm.mission.real_peaceful_mode.husk1.mes: So, whom's the next sinner coming to mine place?
Oh, my... I'm sorry, I come for peace and I will leave right now.
How dare thou? Thou regard thou just run aroint from mine place? I be will dispatch thou!
What? This guy looks really tough. Although I defeated the tyrant of zombie before, I still feel no confidence about this fight.
What a hard struggle! Why does this guy still look unhurt? I'm so hot and thirsty...
But it's cloudy now, which makes me feel better.
Where's mine sun? Mine goddess's leaving me again...
... Thou are thrifty, sinner. Now leave mine place, or I shall sear thou to a crisp!
This guy converts into a stone... Fine, there's no meaning to fight anymore. I'm so tired and thirsty, so maybe I should leave and find water sources.
rpm.mission.real_peaceful_mode.husk2.mes: Please... My family haven't drunk any clean water for weeks. We may die for this...
Hello, uh, I just heard about your dilemma. Maybe I can help you, sir.
Oh, god. Player? Wait... Are you the warrior who defeated the tyrant of zombies?
Help us, warrior... Our pharaoh controls the water supply of us, imposes a heavy tax on us, and kills everyone who tries to run away.
You know how difficult it is to raise crops in the desert? But now I just need clean water...
Don't worry, I will help you. You have already dig a well, what can I do for you?
I don't know how to purify the water. I know villagers in desert are able to make it clean, but I'm afraid they frown upon my presence there.
I made this flocculant to purify the water.
Thanks, my hero! How does it work?
Simple. Throw it into the water, and it will make sediment subside.
I see it! Thank you very much for saving us. I will tell everyone about what you do today. By the way, have you seen the pharaoh of us?
It is him who asks us to kill all human beings in this desert, but we don't like murdering. I believe you can defeat him, and bring peace and free to us.
All his power comes from the sun. When the sun fall, or it becomes cloudy, the pharaoh will convert into a hard stone.
This is your chance - use something to wax him to cut off the energy supply of the sun.
It's me who should be thankful to you. We hope you can set us free from the pharaoh's tyranny.
rpm.mission.real_peaceful_mode.husk3.mes: That's it. I've waxed the stone already.
Oh, so you finally wake up for the last fight, cowardly pharaoh?
Thou't still beat me without the sun power!
Stop resisting! As a monarch of husks, what have you done for them? They are living hard lives. Don't you know that?
What care I about what lives they are living, because I am the pharaoh whom hath supreme power and wealth!
Fine, the negotiation broke down. You will pay for your foolish!
Why... Why am I defeated... by a player?
Because you are selfish, stupid and complacent. You do not know why your people really want.
What they want... Should they betray me, I shall dispatch 'em...
You are such a fool to the end. That's why your people don't like you. They are yearning for peace, and eager to live on their own.
What are you holding? A scepter? Well, it looks like you don't need it anymore.
